title: (x) Please help me with this font / 'the Notting Hill shopping bag' - Helvetica Neue Black {Greg Shutters}
content:
Can you please help me with this font...I thought is Helvetica but "e" and "o" is a bit different. Any thoughts?  
Many thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016015935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nb_6208.jpg)
author: djlevel

comments.content: I think it is Helvetica Neue Black.
